mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_id, user_pw, user_nick, user_email, user_name, user_phone, user_addr) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_nick}, #{user_email},#{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{user_addr})
mapper.select: select * from t_user where user_id = #{user_id} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
mapper.update: update t_user set user_type = 'P', user_b_key = #{billing_key} where user_id = #{customer_key}
update t_user set user_type = 'U', user_b_key = 'N' where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select IF(COUNT(*) = 1, 1, 0) from t_user where user_id = #{user_id} and user_point >= #{amount}
mapper.update: update t_user set user_point = user_point + #{amount} where user_id = #{user_id}
